tns:patch.author: cdolghier
tns:patch.description: add a global settings for the default value of the rich export type

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings(id, settingsName, settingsValue, possibleValues, description, section) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Rich Excel Export Enabled by Default', 'false', 't_Boolean', 'Whether the Excel Export menu should have the "Rich Export" enabled by default', 'user');
